# Personal Payslips

# Payslip List

You can view all your issued payslips here on Skhokho (opens new window). Every month when HR runs payroll, a new payslip will be added to your list. You can access historical records here too.

This is an example of the payslips list.

You can view any and/or download for your records any payslip issued to you. When a new payslip is issued, you will get an email notification.
